header:
<js>
function md5ToUuid(md5String) {
  const uuid = md5String.substr(0, 8) + '-' +
               md5String.substr(8, 4) + '-' +
               md5String.substr(12, 4) + '-' +
               md5String.substr(16, 4) + '-' +
               md5String.substr(20);
  return uuid;
}
// java.log(baseUrl)
var cookie = source.getLoginHeader() || ""
var uuid = java.randomUUID().toString().toUpperCase()
var deviceUUID = md5ToUuid(java.md5Encode(java.androidId())).toString().toString().toUpperCase()
java.log(deviceUUID)
var time = Date.now()
var security = JSON.parse(sendGetRequest(`https://ikun.laoguantx.top:45554/sfapi/sign?uuid=${uuid}&time=${time}&deviceuuid=${deviceUUID}`)).data
var header = {
	cookie: cookie,
  "user-agent": `boluobao/5.0.60(android;29)/H5/${deviceUUID.toLowerCase()}/H5`,
  sfsecurity: `nonce=${uuid}&timestamp=${time}&devicetoken=${deviceUUID}&sign=${security}`,
  authorization: "Basic YW5kcm9pZHVzZXI6MWEjJDUxLXl0Njk7KkFjdkBxeHE=",
  accept: "application/vnd.sfacg.api+json;version=1"
}
JSON.stringify(header)
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
function getRequestHeader() {
  function md5ToUuid(md5String) {
    const uuid = md5String.substr(0, 8) + '-' +
                 md5String.substr(8, 4) + '-' +
                 md5String.substr(12, 4) + '-' +
                 md5String.substr(16, 4) + '-' +
                 md5String.substr(20);
    return uuid;
  }

  var uuid = java.randomUUID().toString().toUpperCase();
  var androidId = java.androidId();
  var deviceUUID = md5ToUuid(java.md5Encode(androidId)).toUpperCase();
  // java.log(deviceUUID);
  var time = Date.now();
  var security = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://ikun.laoguantx.top:45554/sfapi/sign?uuid=${uuid}&time=${time}&deviceuuid=${deviceuuid}`)).data;
  var header = {
    "user-agent": `boluobao/5.0.60(android;29)/H5/${deviceUUID.toLowerCase()}/H5`,
    sfsecurity: `nonce=${uuid}&timestamp=${time}&devicetoken=${deviceUUID}&sign=${security}`,
    authorization: "Basic YW5kcm9pZHVzZXI6MWEjJDUxLXl0Njk7KkFjdkBxeHE=",
    accept: "application/vnd.sfacg.api+json;version=1"
  };
  return header;
}

var result = source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(result)
var account = source.getLoginInfoMap().get('è´¦å·')
var password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get('å¯†ç ')

function login() {
  java.toast("æ­£åœ¨ç™»å½•ä¸­ï¼Œè¯·ç­‰ä¸€ä¼šï¼Œå¾ˆå¿«å°±å¥½...")
  java.getLoginHeader()
  var options = {
    body: JSON.stringify({
      password: password,
      shuMeiId: '',
      username: account,
    }),
    method: 'POST',
  }
  var request = java.log (java.ajax(`https://api.sfacg.com/sessions,${JSON.stringify(options)}`))
  if (JSON.parse(request).status.httpCode != 200) {
    java.toast(JSON.parse(request).status.msg)
    throw new Error("ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥...")
  } else {
    java.toast("æ¬¢è¿ï¼Œç™»å½•æˆåŠŸï¼")
    java.putLoginHeader(java.getCookie("sfacg.com"))
    cookie.removeCookie("sfacg.com")
  }
}

function _getYear() {
  return new Date().getFullYear()
}

function getTodayDate() {
  // format: 2020-12-31
  return `${_getYear()}-${new Date().getMonth() + 1}-${new Date().getDate()}`
}

function buildsigninresultstr(data) {
  let res = ''
  data.forEach(i => {
    res += `${i.name} * ${i.num}\n`
  })
  return res.trim()
}

function checkin() {
  let url = 'https://api.sfacg.com/user/newSignInfo'
  var headers = getRequestHeader()
  headers["cookie"] = source.getLoginHeader()
  let options = {
    body: JSON.stringify({
      signDate: getTodayDate(),
    }),
    headers: headers
  }
  let request = sendPutRequest(url, options.body, options.headers)
  java.toast(request)
  if (JSON.parse(request).status.httpCode != 200) {
    java.toast(JSON.parse(request).status.msg)
  } else {
    java.toast('çœŸæ£’ï¼Œç­¾åˆ°æˆåŠŸï¼\nè·å¾—\n' + buildsigninresultstr(JSON.parse(request).data))
  }
}
function fakead() {
  var headers = getRequestHeader()
  headers["cookie"] = source.getLoginHeader()
  bodyRequestTask = sendPutRequest("https://api.sfacg.com/user/tasks/21/requirements", `{"num":1}`, headers)
  java.log(bodyRequestTask)
  var headers = getRequestHeader()
  headers["cookie"] = source.getLoginHeader()
  body = JSON.parse(sendPutRequest("https://api.sfacg.com/user/tasks/21", "", headers))
  java.log(JSON.stringify(body))
  if (body.status.errorCode == 200) {
    java.toast("çœ‹å¹¿å‘ŠæˆåŠŸï¼" + body.data.couponNum == 0 ? "" : ("\nä»£åˆ¸ * " + body.data.couponNum))
  } else {
    java.toast("çœ‹å¹¿å‘Šå¤±è´¥...\n" + body.data.msg)
  }
}

</js>

<js>
if (!String(baseUrl).includes("api.sfacg.com")) {
  baseUrl = `https://api.sfacg.com/novels/${String(baseUrl).match("\\d+")[0]}?expand=latestchapter,chapterCount,typeName,intro,fav,ticket,pointCount,tags,sysTags,signlevel,discount,discountExpireDate,totalNeedFireMoney,originTotalNeedFireMoney`
  result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}
var x = JSON.parse(result).data
var syst = []
x.expand.sysTags.forEach((t) => {
  syst.push(t.tagName)
})
x = {
  novelName: x.novelName,
  authorName: x.authorName,
  typeName: [x.expand.typeName, String(x.point) + (String(x.point).includes(".") ? "" : ".0"), x.isFinish ? "å®Œç»“" : "è¿è½½", x.signStatus === "æ™®é€š" ? [] : [x.signStatus], syst].join(","),
  charCount: x.charCount,
  lastChapter: x.expand.latestChapter.title,
  intro: `
  ${(x.expand.discount != 1 && x.signStatus == "VIP") ? ("æ‚¨æ­£äº«å—æœ¬ä¹¦çš„" + String(x.expand.discount * 10).replace(".0", "") + "æŠ˜ï¼ŒæŠ˜æ‰£å°†äº" + x.expand.discountExpireDate.replace("T", " ") + "ç»“æŸ") : ""}
  ğŸ”– æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š${x.expand.latestChapter.addTime.replace("T", " ")}
  ‎
  ğŸ·ï¸ ç®€ä»‹ï¼š ${x.expand.intro.trim()}
  ‎
  ğŸ”– å¼€ä¹¦æ—¶é—´ï¼š${x.addTime.replace("T", " ")}
  ${(x.signStatus != "æ™®é€š")
  ? (
      "ç­¾çº¦ç­‰çº§ï¼š" + (
        (x.expand.signLevel == "normal")
        ? "å¾…ä¸Šæ¶"
        : x.expand.signLevel.replace("vip", "") + "çº§"
      )
    )
  : ""}
  ‎
  ${book.getVariable("custom") == "s" ? "ğŸ”— åˆ†äº«é“¾æ¥: https://book.sfacg.com/Novel/" + x.novelId : ""}
  `
  ,
  novelCover: x.novelCover,
  url: `https://api.sfacg.com/novels/${x.novelId}/dirs`,
}
x
</js>

ruleContent.content: let content = '' body = JSON.parse(result) data = body.data if (!data.expand.content && data.expand.chatLines.length !== 0) { content = "æœ¬ç« èŠ‚ä¸ºå¯¹è¯ç« èŠ‚\n================\n\u3000\u3000" dataArr = data.expand.chatLines dataArr.forEach(z => { content += (z.avatar ? z.charName ? `` + z.charName + ': ' + (z.image ? `${z.content}\n` : z.content) + '\n' : `` + (z.image ? `${z.content}\n` : z.content) + '\n' : z.charName ? z.charName + ': ' + (z.image ? `${z.content}\n` : z.content) + '\n' : z.image ? `${z.content}\n` : z.content + '\n') + '================\n' }) } else if (data.expand.content != '') { let dArr = data.expand.content.split("\n") dArr.forEach((line) => { line = line.trim() if (/\[img=\d+,\d+\](.*?)\[\/img\]/.test(line)) { content += `\n` } else { content += line + "\n" } }) } else { java.log("ä»˜è´¹ç« èŠ‚") var moneyReq = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.sfacg.com/user/money")) if (moneyReq.data != null) { content = `æœªè´­ä¹°ç« èŠ‚ï¼Œè¯·è´­ä¹°ååˆ·æ–°ç« èŠ‚\nä½ è¿˜æœ‰${moneyReq.data.fireMoneyRemain}ç«åˆ¸\n${moneyReq.data.couponsRemain}ä»£åˆ¸\nè´­ä¹°æœ¬ç« éœ€è¦${data.expand.needFireMoney}ç«åˆ¸` } else { content = "ä»˜è´¹ç« èŠ‚ï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•åæŸ¥çœ‹" } } if (data.expand.isContentEncrypted && body.status.httpCode == 200 && data.expand.content) { content = JSON.parse(sendPostRequest("https://ikun.laoguantx.top:45554/sfapi/contentdecrypt", "content=" + java.encodeURI(content) + "&cid=" + body.data.chapId + "&isVip=" + body.data.isVip)).data } content

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data

if (data == null || !data) {
  throw new Error("æ— æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•åæŸ¥çœ‹")
} else if (data.newPush) {
  java.log('handler: ä½¿ç”¨newPushæ–¹æ³•è§£æ')
  data = processNovels(data.newPush)
} else if (data[0] != undefined && (data[0].novel != undefined || data[0].album != undefined)) {
  java.log('handler: ä½¿ç”¨æ ‡å‡†æ–¹å¼è§£æ')
  data = processNovels(data)
} else if (Array.isArray(data) && !data[0].expand.novels) {
  java.log('handler: ä½¿ç”¨æ’è¡Œæ¦œæ–¹å¼è§£æ')
  data = processNovels(data)
} else if (data[0].expand != undefined && data[0].expand.novels != undefined) {
  java.log('handler: ä½¿ç”¨ç«è¢‹æ–¹å¼è§£æ')
  data = processNovels(data[0].expand.novels)
}

function processNovels(novels) {
  var dArr = []
  novels.forEach(x => {
    if (x.novel) {
      x = x.novel
    }
    if (!x.album) {
      var syst = []
      x.expand.sysTags.forEach((t) => {
        syst.push(t.tagName)
      })
      dArr.push({
        novelName: x.novelName,
        authorName: x.authorName,
        typeName: [x.expand.typeName, String(x.point) + (String(x.point).includes(".") ? "" : ".0"), x.isFinish ? "å®Œç»“" : "è¿è½½", x.signStatus === "æ™®é€š" ? [] : [x.signStatus], syst].join(","),
        charCount: x.charCount,
        lastChapter: x.expand.latestChapter.title,
        intro: x.expand.intro,
        novelCover: x.novelCover,
        bookUrl: `https://api.sfacg.com/novels/${x.novelId}?expand=latestchapter,chapterCount,typeName,intro,fav,ticket,pointCount,tags,sysTags,signlevel,discount,discountExpireDate,totalNeedFireMoney,originTotalNeedFireMoney`,
      })
    }
  })
  return dArr
}

data
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>var data = JSON.parse(result).data
var cArr = []
data.volumeList.forEach((v) => {
  cArr.push({
    title: v.title,
    isVolume: true,
    url: "",
    isVip: false,
    isBuy: false,
  })
  v.chapterList.forEach((c) => {
    // java.log(c.needFireMoney == 0 && c.isVip)
    cArr.push({
      title: (c.isVip && c.needFireMoney == 0 ? "âœ¿Â·" : "") + c.title,
      update: (c.updateTime ? c.updateTime.replace("T", " ") : c.AddTime.replace("T", " ")) + `, ${c.charCount}å­—`,
      isVolume: false,
      url: `https://api.sfacg.com/Chaps/${c.chapId}?expand=content,needFireMoney,originNeedFireMoney,tsukkomi,chatlines,isbranch,isContentEncrypted,authorTalk&autoOrder=false`,
      isBuy: c.needFireMoney == 0,
      isVip: c.isVip && c.needFireMoney != 0,
    })
  })
})
cArr
</js>
